overview:
Clare Mckee is a strategic marketing consultant with 20 years experience helping small, medium and well known large companies boost sales.

Clare launched Best Marketing Quotes as a means of helping clients select the right kind of marketing company. By eradicating the lottery of choice and vetting potential marketing suplliers, Clare is able to match the client with a company who can do the job they claim to be able to do.

Eliminating uncertainty and zooming straight in on a ‘smart’ shortlist. Saves clients endless pro-tracted search and brings fresh leads to willing marketing companies.

The service is free to the client. Monetisation is by way of charging for the leads. Only four marketing suppliers per lead, well matched, ensuring high conversion rates within the Best Marketing Quotes membership.

degrees.subject: Creative Media Practice
degrees.institution: Bournemouth University Centre of Excellence in Media Practice
